医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究确定了帕金森病的区域热点巴罗神经学研究所的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，与生活在空气污染水平最低地区的人相比，生活在空气污染中等水平地区的人患帕金森病的风险高出 56%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-study-identizes-regional-hotspots-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-study-identizes-regional-hotspots-for-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20938cad-5040-41b1-9aa1-daa6d208ae18 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 23:57:00 -0400 New study identifies regional hotspots for Parkinson's disease
辛辛那提大学将在未来五年领导 NIH StrokeNet辛辛那提大学和 UC Health 已更新为美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) StrokeNet 国家协调中心，该中心是 NIH 资助的多中心中风试验的主要基础设施，也是成人和儿童新的潜在治疗方法的管道患有中风和有中风风险的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/University-of-Cincinnati-to-lead-NIH-StrokeNet-for-next- Five-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/University-of-Cincinnati-to-lead-NIH-StrokeNet-for-next- Five-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a14a93a-f30c-4cee-a880-ce346563de92 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 23:16:54 -0400 University of Cincinnati to lead NIH StrokeNet for next five years
熬夜和不吃早餐会增加患心脏病的风险，尤其是男性一项大规模研究表明，不吃早餐的晚睡者患代谢综合征和心血管疾病的风险较高，尤其是男性。影响因年龄和性别而异，表明睡眠模式、饮食习惯和心脏健康之间存在复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Late-nights-and-skipping-breakfast-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk-special-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Late-nights-and-skipping-breakfast-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk-special-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edcbf548-244f-406c-a959-ac3c5c76aea1 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 23:14:00 -0400 Late nights and skipping breakfast linked to increased heart disease risk, especially in men
确定了治疗三阴性乳腺癌的有希望的新药物靶点三阴性乳腺癌（TNBC）是一种预后极差且治疗靶点有限的侵袭性肿瘤，改善其治疗一直具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Promising-new-drug-target-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Promising-new-drug-target-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74ab55ef-d7e6-4686-9462-1361c9cccdba Mon, 30 Oct 2023 22:53:55 -0400 Promising new drug target for triple-negative breast cancer identified
为靶向药物输送和中和生物制剂而开发的模块化纳米颗粒加州大学圣地亚哥分校的工程师开发了模块化纳米颗粒，可以轻松定制以针对不同的生物实体，例如肿瘤、病毒或毒素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Modular-nanoarticles-development-for-targeted-drug-delivery-and-neutralizing-biological-agents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Modular-nanoarticles-development-for-targeted-drug-delivery-and-neutralizing-biological-agents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32697b16-f8e0-4721-bc99-82caecb1c9dd Mon, 30 Oct 2023 22:48:02 -0400 Modular nanoparticles developed for targeted drug delivery and neutralizing biological agents
Rett 综合征中发现并表征的新 MECP2 基因变异雷特综合征是一种罕见的破坏性神经系统疾病，主要影响年轻女孩，表现为行走和说话能力受损，以及典型的“扭手”动作、癫痫发作和认知障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-MECP2-gene-variant-identified-and-characterized-in-Rett-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/New-MECP2-gene-variant-identified-and-characterized-in-Rett-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5374695b-ff8d-456c-9fc0-8be213d0776a Mon, 30 Oct 2023 22:41:52 -0400 New MECP2 gene variant identified and characterized in Rett syndrome
上网太多？研究表明互联网使用问题与多动症症状加剧有关这项荟萃分析揭示了有问题的互联网使用（PIU）与 ADHD 症状之间的显着关联，特别是在未经临床诊断的成年男性中。该研究强调需要进一步研究管理互联网使用和多动症症状的潜在干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Surfing-the-web-too-much-Study-links-problematic-internet-use-to-heightened-ADHD-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Surfing-the-web-too-much-Study-links-problematic-internet-use-to-heightened-ADHD-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13c91035-0cd6-4e6d-b07b-accf78968ff2 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 22:38:00 -0400 Surfing the web too much? Study links problematic internet use to heightened ADHD symptoms
科学家们确定了一些 COVID-19 疫苗后导致致命血栓的机制新的研究发现了一种导致一些患者在接种某些类型的 Covid-19 疫苗后出现致命凝血的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Scientists-identify-mechanism-causing-deadly-blood-clots-after-some-COVID-19-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Scientists-identify-mechanism-causing-deadly-blood-clots-after-some-COVID-19-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a102e7a-61c2-4a9b-95b8-24978ce4e1d5 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 22:34:52 -0400 Scientists identify mechanism causing deadly blood clots after some COVID-19 vaccines
气候变化将使低收入国家的海鲜营养成分减少 30% UBC 的最新研究表明，由于气候变化，到本世纪末，低收入国家从海鲜中获取的营养物质可能会减少 30%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Climate-change-to-slash-seafood- Nutritions-by-3025-in-low-venue-countries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Climate-change-to-slash-seafood- Nutritions-by-3025-in-low-venue-countries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e38949a5-61ef-4151-b4f0-62525bd6fffe Mon, 30 Oct 2023 21:30:58 -0400 Climate change to slash seafood nutrients by 30% in low-income countries
科学家确定酒精戒断性头痛的机制全球约有 2.83 亿人患有酒精使用障碍，这是一种使人衰弱的健康挑战，可用的治疗选择有限。据估计，每年给社会造成的损失超过 2 万亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Scientists-identify-mechanism-of-alcohol-withdrawal-headaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231030/Scientists-identify-mechanism-of-alcohol-withdrawal-headaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d828a725-7b1b-4e23-9474-59cc59386ec3 Mon, 30 Oct 2023 21:25:07 -0400 Scientists identify mechanism of alcohol withdrawal headaches
